allow: Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clinical.visits;")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U crm_user -d fondazione_crm -c "\d auth.users")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT id, nome, cognome, is_active FROM patient.patients ORDER BY id;")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT id, name, description FROM auth.roles ORDER BY id;")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U crm_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT id, username, email, is_active, role_id FROM auth.users WHERE id = 17;")

Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.first_name, u.last_name, r.name as role_name FROM auth.users u LEFT JOIN auth.roles r ON u.role_id = r.id ORDER BY u.id;")

Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "SELECT u.id, u.username, u.first_name, u.last_name, r.name as role_name FROM auth.users u LEFT JOIN auth.roles r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = 26;")
Bash(winpty docker exec -it fondazione-crm-postgres psql -U fondazione_user -d fondazione_crm -c "\d patient.patients")
